Title: thymey-wimey-french-toast
Ingredients:
1/4 cup melted butter
 1/4 cup milk
 2 thick slices crusty bread
 2 teaspoons dried thyme leaves
 1/3 cup shredded sharp cheddar cheese, salt and cracked black pepper to taste

Title: french-toast-cupcakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 cups all-purpose flour
 2/3 cup milk
 1/2 cup yogurt
 1/2 cup white sugar
 1/2 cup butter, melted
 1/2 cup raisins
 1/3 cup dark brown sugar
 2 tablespoons maple syrup, or more to taste
 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract
 1 teaspoon baking powder
 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
 1/2 teaspoon baking soda
 1/2 teaspoon salt

Title: vegan-french-toast
Ingredients:
1 cup soy milk
 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
 1 tablespoon nutritional yeast
 1 teaspoon raw sugar
 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
 1/3 teaspoon ground cinnamon
 4 slices bread

Title: hillshire-farm-litl-smokies-french-toast-bites
Ingredients:
1 (12.5 ounce) package frozen french toast
 1 (14 ounce) package hillshire farm lit'l smokies\xae smoked sausage
 1/4 cup maple syrup, plus extra for brushing
 40 toothpicks
 1 teaspoon dijon mustard
 1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar
